msbt.message: We're finally getting a new islander, ! I'm so excited I could dance all night! Normally I only dance half of the night. Ha HA!
We got a new friend here on today.It feels like all of the social-media influencing I've been doing is finally paying off!
Our new neighbor is here! I'm gonna go introduce myself, !Should I lead with "" or wait five minutes to start sprinkling it into conversation?
Noob alert! We've got a new rookie incoming!How was that?<10_4 /> I'm playing a jock in my new one- show and I want to sound the part.
So, tomorrow is 's birthday, and I've got the PERFECT thing for . I mean, it's perfect for me, so I assume it'll be perfect for . Ha HA!

Alright, 's birthday is tomorrow. Are you ready?! I've got the whole scene mapped. I'll hand over my gift and will be likeack! But, like, a GOOD ack. Like, an, "Ohmigosh, that is the best gift EVER" ack, .
You know that tomorrow is 's birthday, right?I've prepared the ultimate gift. I expect nothing in return.<10_4 /> You're welcome!
Tomorrow's the big day, I suppose will leave our little island paradise first thing. I'll be seeing off today with a smile and a spin, as is my custom. You should say goodbye too.
You know that won't be living on as of tomorrow, right? I'm sad, but it'll be a great chance for me to put on a happy act and pretend that everything's fine.
Today is 's last day on .I know I'll see again, but I'm still going to send off with an over- the-top, melodramatic dance routine.
